cards.title: 基本设置
cards.code:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Canvas 示例</title>
  </head>
  <body>
    <canvas id="myCanvas" width="500" height="400"
      style="border:1px solid #000000;">
    </canvas>
    <script src="script.js"></script>
  </body>
</html>

cards.title: 获取上下文
cards.code:
const canvas = document.getElementById("myCanvas");

const ctx = canvas.getContext("2d");
